main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object described as a red object the size of a pea with a burning green color, silently passing and then gradually disappearing.
interesting points: The object was detected on ground radar,The sighting was reported on July 27, 1958,The object had a bright green trajectory and made no sound,The sighting's description aligns closely with typical fireball reports yet includes radar detection,Ground visual observations were also mentioned in association with the sighting.
sighted object: one red object burning green color
witness description: a father saw the bright object
